# How to program using STM32CubeProgrammer

Note: if you don't have STM32CubeProgrammer, but the board has USB Mass Storage support,
you can use the stlink_dragdrop.tar.gz package.


To program using STM32CubeProgrammer, follow the instruction here:
https://docs.nanoframework.net/content/stm32/flash-cube-programmer.html

Use the `damc_stm32f723disco.elf` file to flash the board.
